chirptask.storage

Class LocalStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • chirptask.storage.LocalStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStorage

    public class LocalStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStorage
    This class handles the tasks list in XML format. The XML file it manages contains tasks id, description, contexts, categories and deadline/start time - end time
